fields.description:
Error is thrown along with Warning in console.

Steps To Reproduce:

1. Run the Kitchen Sink application
2. Tap on Phone>Camera>Camera Custom Overlay
3. Click on "Take Picture" button.

Actual Result: Following error is thrown along with the warning:

<Warning>: [DEBUG] picture was taken
<Error>: CGAffineTransformInvert: singular matrix.
<Error>: CGAffineTransformInvert: singular matrix.


Expected Result: should see <Notice>: [DEBUG] picture was taken
fields.summary: iOS :Kitchen Sink : Camera: Custom Overlay - Error is thrown along with Warning in console
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio:2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium SDK: 2.1.3.v20120918170114
iOS Device: iPhone 4s(5.1)
OS: Mac OSX 10.8.1

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
